bio: My name is Harry, A computer science students with minor stream Artificial Intelligence and has been working as a Software Engineer Backend around 7 years.Backend Development has become my specialization, but I do fine working as Cloud / DevOps Engineer / Site Reliability Engineer where focusing on building applications with following scalability, reliability and 12 factor apps principles. Writing code has become my passion since the moment I tried to build my own console space shooting games with applying core programming principles, design pattern and software engineering practices on my 2nd semester.Currently I'm interest learning and back to studying topics related with the Cloud Computing and Generative AI, eager to explore how these technologies can further enhance backend engineering and open new doors in intelligent systems development.

description: Working on several projects support the company's mission expanding their product and services to Qatar and Middle East region.
Working on frontend and backend development of web applications supporting the billing and accounting process of the company
Working on backend development applications supporting of device air quality monitoring such as reading and processing data from sensor, storing data to database, and providing API for frontend
Working on backend development for redesigning and refactoring the legacy system into new microservices architecture writing in Go programming language
Working on backend development for data restructuring and implement the worker pool 100k on average data processing sensor air quality data to Bigquery by leverages Go concurrency and NSQ

prakerja.company: Coordinating Ministry for Economic Affairs - Prakerja
description: Developed backend microservices in Go and NodeJS, contributing to scalable microservices architecture
Contributing into system design and backend architecture
Improving unit test, security and refactoring codebase
Provide support on-call 24/7 for production issues and initiate the root cause analysis
Provide support for partner integration in module fraud engine to prevent any fraud users

personal_website.name: Personal Websites
personal_website.description: Personal portofolio websites, building the Frontend Static Sites by using Sveltekit and TailwindCSS for design layout. Purpose of this projects is to showcase my self and journey what I have done as Backend Software Engineer and starting to recap what I have learnt so far in computer science fields. Stay tune.

prakerja_dashboard.name: Prakerja Dashboard
prakerja_dashboard.description: Prakerja Dashboard Web Applications, let users going through the digital platform, register batch program and getting the course credits for joining and participate the training courses.
